PROBABLE CAUSE AFFIDAVIT

OBTS Number

Agency ORI Number
FLO 5 0 0 6 0 0
Agency Name
PALM BEACH POLICE DEPARTMENT
Agency Report Number
7 6 1 0 5 1 0 0 1 2 6 3 1 0 2

Charge Type
1. Felony
2. Traffic Felony
3. Misdemeanor
4. Traffic Misdemeanor
5. Ordinance
6. Other

Charge Description
Possession of Marijuana
Charge Description
Possession of Drug Paraphernalia

Victim's Name (Last, First, Middle)

Local Address (Street, Apt. Number)
(City)
(State)
(Zip)
Phone

Business Address (Name, Street)
(City)
(State)
(Zip)
Phone

The undersigned certifies and swears that he/she has just and reasonable grounds to believe, and does believe that the above named Defendant committed the following violation of law.
The Person taken into custody.
committed the below acts in my presence.
was observed by
that he/she saw the arrested person commit the below acts.
confessed to
admitting to the below facts.
was found to have committed the below acts, resulting from my (described) investigation.

On the 11 day of SEPTEMBER, 2005 at 1147 AM KPM (Specifically include facts constituting cause for arrest.)

on Sunday, SEPTEMBER 11, 2005 AT APPROXIMATELY 23:06 Hours, I OBSERVED A FOUR DOOR WHITE MITSUBISHI, FL TAG ACTIVITY PARKED IN A SAFETY ZONE WITHIN A CURVE IN THE ROADWAY, ACROSS FROM 760 NORTH OCEAN BLVD. AS I DROVE UP BEHIND THE VEHICLE, THE VEHICLE LEFT THE SAFETY ZONE WHICH I THEN CONDUCTED A CAR STOP ON THE 200 BLOCK OF BAHAMA LANE. UPON APPROACHING THE AUTO, I OBSERVED FIVE OCCUPANTS INSIDE THE CAR, SEVERAL HAVING BLOODSHOT EYES. I ALSO DETECTED AN ODOR OF MARIJUANA FROM INSIDE THE AUTO ALONG WITH OBSERVING THE OCCUPANTS APPEARING TO BE NERVOUS. I SPOKE WITH THE OCCUPANTS OF THE VEHICLE AND ASKED THEM IF THEY HAD MARIJUANA. THE DEFENDANT INFORMED ME THAT SHE DID, SHOWING ME A CLEAR PLASTIC BAG CONTAINING MARIJUANA, A BROWN PAPER BAG CONTAINING MARIJUANA AND A GLASS PIPE CONTAINING MARIJUANA RESIDUE. BOTH THE MARIJUANA AND DRUG PARAPHERNALIA TESTED POSITIVE.

BASED ON THE ABOVEMENTIONED INCIDENT, I ARRESTED AND CHARGED
WITH POSSESSION OF MARIJUANA, FSS 893.13(6)(B) AND POSSESSION OF DRUG PARAPHERNALIA, FSS 893.147.
(Marijuana weighed at 15.0 grams)

SWORN AND SUBSCRIBED BEFORE ME
Set K Bierd
NOTARY PUBLIC/Clerk of Court/Police Officer
9-12-05
DATE

Ofc Pdt
SIGNATURE OF ARRESTING/INVESTIGATING OFFICER
Ofc Nicholas Carlson
NAME OF OFFICER (PLEASE PRINT)
9/14/05
DATE
1 OF 1
PAGE

DISTRIBUTION:
WHITE - Court Copy
GREEN - State Attorney
YELLOW - Agency
PINK - Agency

07/26/17 Page 74 of 104 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00031691

I ALSO DETECTED AN ODOR OF MARIJUANA FROM INSIDE THE AUTO ALONG WITH OBSERVING THE OCCUPANTS APPEARING TO BE NERVOUS. I SPOKE WITH THE OCCUPANTS OF THE VEHICLE AND ASKED THEM IF THEY HAD MARIJUANA. additional_notes: The document is a Probable Cause Affidavit from the Palm Beach Police Department, detailing an arrest made on September 11, 2005. The affidavit includes a handwritten statement from the arresting officer and is signed by both the officer and a notary public. The document is part of a larger collection, as indicated by the page number (74 of 104) and the public records request number (17-295).
